content.title: Chapter 4
content.subtitle: Transparency And Oversight In Energy Governance
content.body: Thank you for joining us for the fourth chapter of “An Energy Governance For A Just Energy Transition” Module. We invite you to interact with the closing scenario, and to reflect on how you can take action to move these ideas from ambitions into action.
